description: The work covers the supply of all labour, material, tools, equipment, supervision and transportation required for installation and maintenance of structural cabling systems for telecommunications and various electrical services. The services will be performed by qualified electricians and indentured apprentices of BC, as and when requested by Real Property Operations Section Esquimalt Contract Coordinator Officer, CFB Esquimalt, Victoria, BC or authorized representative during the period specified.
full_summary:
# Low Voltage Electrical Standing Offer
## Request for Standing Offer
### Contract Information

* **Reference Number:** WS4485683053-Doc4533006291
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4485683053
* **Publication Date:** 2024-04-11
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-21T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-08-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2029-07-31

### Services and Deliverables

The Standing Offer is for the supply of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, supervision, and transportation required for the installation and maintenance of structural cabling systems for telecommunications and electrical services. This work will be performed by qualified electricians and indentured apprentices from British Columbia, as and when requested by the Real Property Operations Section, CFB Esquimalt, Victoria, BC, or authorized representatives during the specified period.

### Trade Agreements

This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

This Standing Offer is open to all qualified contractors with no geographical restrictions.

### Regions of Delivery

* British Columbia

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contracting Entity Contact:**
  * Clara Dumay (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Phone: Not available
  * Email: clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Availability of Contract
